title: Lacoste Men's 100% Cotton Regular Fit V-Neck T-Shirt, 3-Pack
description: COMFORTABLE AND SOFT: Made of soft, lightweight 100% cotton jersey, these everyday must-have for layering under dress shirts offers maximum comfort and breathability.
REGULAR FIT: Natural ease on body featuring a ribbed v-neck collar.
LACOSTE'S SIGNATURE: Crocodile tag at the bottom of the garment
EASY CARE: They are machine washable and should be line dried, making them a practical choice for everyday wear while ensuring they retain their shape and comfort over time.
This trio of soft cotton t-shirts is the essential new addition to your everyday basics.
